A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What I at first thought was boldness (fresh from my viewing) I now think of as disrespect and egotistical arrogance - to the fans who made Star Wars the phenomenon it was and to the characters and tone and spirit of the SW movies. And I can no longer ignore the poor job in handling character\, chemistry\, motivation\, plot and sub plot\, casting....Kathleen Kennedy and Rian Johnson screwed this up in a major way. I am glad he will not touch SW 9. I have no such hope that she will not mar SW 9. Take the time to watch the review videos-it has all been said already. Johnson and Kennedy  made a movie that trashed my favorite characters\, missed too many opportunities\, wasted time with inane add-on one nonsense plots\, and made me feel sick in my gut (something the mediocre middle trilogy never could.)  What a waste and a damn shame. For the first time in my life I have actual resentment and animosity towards figures for a movie they made. Thanks to Mark Hamill for doing so well with what was given him.
